00036 unsigned TCPHeader::EstimateTCPHeaderLength(Packet &p)
00037 {
00038     unsigned char len;
00039     Buffer &b = p.GetPayload();
00040 
00041     b.GetData((char *)&len, 1, 12);
00042 
00043     len = (len >> 4) & 0xf;
00044     len *= 4;
00045 
00046     return len;
00047 
00048 }

00051 {

00110 void TCPHeader::GetHeaderLen(unsigned char &len) const
00111 {
00112     GetData((char *)&len, 1, 12);
00113     len = (len >> 4) & 0xf;

00116 void TCPHeader::SetHeaderLen(const unsigned char &new_len, const Packet &p)
00117 {
00118   unsigned char tmp_len;
00119 
00120   GetData((char *)&tmp_len, 1, 12);
00121   tmp_len = (tmp_len & 0x0f) | ((new_len << 4) & 0xf0);
00122   SetData((char *)&tmp_len, 1, 12);
00123 
00124   RecomputeChecksum(p);
00125 }

00127 void TCPHeader::GetFlags(unsigned char &flags) const
00128 {
00129     GetData((char *)&flags, 1, 13);
00130     flags &= 0x3f;
00131 }
00132 
00133 void TCPHeader::SetFlags(const unsigned char &new_flags, const Packet &p)
00134 {
00135   unsigned char ft;
00136 
00137   GetData((char*)&ft,1,13);
00138   ft&=64+128;
00139   ft|=(new_flags&(1+2+4+8+16+32));
00140   SetData((char*)&ft,1,13);
00141 
00142   RecomputeChecksum(p);
00143 }

00158 unsigned short TCPHeader::ComputeChecksum(const Packet &p) const
00159 {
00160   // assumes we DO have an IP header in the packet already
00161   IPHeader iph= (IPHeader &) p.FindHeader(Headers::IPHeader);
00162   IPAddress srcip, destip;
00163   unsigned char proto;
00164 
00165   iph.GetSourceIP(srcip); srcip=htonl(srcip);
00166   iph.GetDestIP(destip); destip=htonl(destip);
00167   iph.GetProtocol(proto);
00168 
00169   unsigned short len, buflen;
00170   unsigned char iphlen;
00171   unsigned char tcphlen;
00172 
00173   GetHeaderLen(tcphlen);
00174 
00175   iph.GetTotalLength(len);
00176   iph.GetHeaderLength(iphlen);
00177 
00178   len-=iphlen*4;
00179 
00180   buflen=((12+len)+(len%2?1:0))/2;
00181 
00182   unsigned short buf[buflen];
00183 
00184   memset((char*)buf,0,2*buflen);
00185 
00186   memcpy((char*)buf,&srcip,4);
00187   memcpy((char*)(buf+2),&destip,4);
00188   buf[4]=htons((unsigned short)proto);
00189   buf[5]=htons(len);
00190 
00191   GetData((char*)&(buf[6]),tcphlen*4,0);
00192 
00193   //YUCK FIX
00194   ((Packet&)p).GetPayload().GetData((char*)(buf+6+tcphlen*2),len-tcphlen*4,0);
00195 
00196   return ~(OnesComplementSum(buf,buflen));
00197 
00198 }

00200 bool TCPHeader::IsCorrectChecksum(const Packet &p) const
00201 {
00202   unsigned short c;
00203   GetChecksum(c);
00204   if (c==0) {
00205     return true;
00206   } else {
00207     return ComputeChecksum(p)==0;
00208   }
00209 }
00210 
00211 void TCPHeader::RecomputeChecksum(const Packet &p)
00212 {
00213   if (GetSize()<TCP_HEADER_BASE_LENGTH) {
00214     SetUrgentPtr(0,p);
00215   }
00216   SetChecksum(0);
00217   unsigned short ck=ComputeChecksum(p);
00218   SetChecksum(ck);
00219 }
00220

00223 void TCPHeader::GetChecksum(unsigned short &checksum) const
00224 {
00225   GetData((char*)&checksum,2,16);
00226   checksum=ntohs(checksum);
00227 }
00228 
00229 void TCPHeader::SetChecksum(const unsigned short &checksum)
00230 {
00231   unsigned short ct=htons(checksum);
00232   SetData((char*)&ct,2,16);
00233 }

00242 void TCPHeader::SetUrgentPtr(const unsigned short &up, const Packet &p)

00252 void TCPHeader::GetOptions(struct TCPOptions &o) const
00253 {
00254     unsigned char hlen;
00255     
00256     GetHeaderLen(hlen);
00257     o.len = (hlen * 4) - TCP_HEADER_BASE_LENGTH;
00258     
00259     if (o.len > 0) {
00260         GetData(o.data, o.len, TCP_HEADER_BASE_LENGTH);
00261     }
00262 }
00263 
00264 void TCPHeader::SetOptions(const struct TCPOptions &o)
00265 {
00266     SetData(o.data, o.len, TCP_HEADER_BASE_LENGTH);
00267 }

00270 std::ostream & TCPHeader::Print(std::ostream &os) const 
00271 {
00272     unsigned short sport, dport, winsize, checksum, uptr;
00273     unsigned int seqno, ackno;
00274     unsigned char hlen, flags;
00275     
00276     GetSourcePort(sport);
00277     GetDestPort(dport);
00278     GetSeqNum(seqno);
00279     GetAckNum(ackno);
00280     GetHeaderLen(hlen);
00281     GetFlags(flags);
00282     GetWinSize(winsize);
00283     GetChecksum(checksum);
00284     GetUrgentPtr(uptr);
00285     
00286 
00287     os << "TCPHeader"
00288        << "(srcport="     << sport
00289        << ", destport="   << dport
00290        << ", seqnum="     << seqno
00291        << ", acknum="     << ackno
00292        << ", hlen="       << ((unsigned)hlen) << "(" << (hlen * 4) << " bytes)"
00293        << ", flags="      << ((unsigned)flags) 
00294        << "("
00295        << (IS_URG(flags) ? " URG " : "")
00296        << (IS_ACK(flags) ? " ACK " : "")
00297        << (IS_PSH(flags) ? " PSH " : "")
00298        << (IS_RST(flags) ? " RST " : "")
00299        << (IS_SYN(flags) ? " SYN " : "")
00300        << (IS_FIN(flags) ? " FIN " : "")
00301        << ")"
00302        << ", winsize="    << winsize
00303        << ", checksum="   << checksum
00304        << ", urgentptr="  << uptr
00305        << ((hlen > 5) ? " HAS OPTIONS" : "")
00306        << ")";
00307 
00308     return os;    
00309 }
